Original meaning 本义: Meaning curtain.

English senses 英语理解: curtain, screen, tent

Usage example 用法举例: 序幕 xù mù (prologue)

幙字的基本解释

幙
mù
古同“幕”。

幙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mù］
［《廣韻》慕各切，入鐸，明。］
亦作“幙1”。
(1)悬空平遮在上面的帷幔。
(2)覆盖用的布。
(3)覆盖；隐蔽。
(4)罩；笼罩。
(5)帐幕；篷帐。
(6)比喻象帐幕一样遮蔽视线的东西。
(7)“幕府”的简称。古代将帅的府署。
(8)泛指衙署。
(9)指幕府聘用的僚属。
(10)指以充当幕友为职业。
(11)垂挂的窗帷，帘幔。
(12)特指舞台上或放映电影用的幕布。
(13)戏剧按照剧情划分的段落。每幕可分若干场，同一幕所表现的情节一般限于一个地点，一段时间。
(14)古代用以遮护臂、腿的甲衣。详“鐵幕”。
(15)古代一种头巾。
(16)外壳。
(17)古人名。舜的祖先。
(18)通“漠”。沙漠。
(19)通“膜”。人或动植物体内的薄皮形组织。
[②]［màn］
［《集韻》莫半切，去换，明。］
金属币的背面。

幙字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幙； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页336第08
【字彙補】同幕。　又借作模。【漢·郞中鄭固?】傳宣孔業，作世幙式。

幙字的源字形

幙字的起名意思

暂无。

mù
Gu Tong "curtain".
screen
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mù］
["Guangyun" Mu Geqie, enter the priest, Ming. ]
Also known as "Curtain 1".
(1) A drapery draped over it.
(2) Cloth for covering.
(3) Covering; concealment.
(4) Cover; shroud.
(5) The tent; the tent.
(6) It is a metaphor for something that obscures the line of sight like a tabernacle.
(7) The abbreviation of "shogunate". The office of an ancient general.
(8) Refers to the government office in general.
(9) Refers to the staff members employed by the shogunate.
(10) Refers to the occupation as a screen friend.
(11) Hanging window curtains and curtains.
(12) Especially refers to the curtain used on stage or showing movie.
(13) The drama is divided into paragraphs according to the plot. Each scene can be divided into several scenes, and the plot shown in the same scene is generally limited to one location and a period of time.
(14) The armor suit used to cover the arms and legs in ancient times. Detailed "Iron Curtain".
(15) An ancient headscarf.
(16) Shell.
(17) Ancient names. The ancestors of Shun.
(18) Through "desert". desert.
(19) Through "membrane". Thin skin-shaped tissue in humans, animals and plants.
[②]［màn］
["Ji Yun" don't cut it in half, change it, Ming. ]
The back of the metal coin.
